articles.content:
Another extraordinary 62-ball century for supreme Smith
Australia are yet to decide who will fill injured opener David Warner's role at the top of the order in tomorrow's final Dettol Series ODI mat… [+5978 chars]

articles.author: Peter Ryan
articles.title: AFL top 20 draft picks to lose bonuses for playing senior games - The Age
articles.description: The first 20 players drafted at next Wednesday's AFL national draft will earn $90,000 base pay next season and no longer receive incentive payments for playing senior games.
articles.content: Jamarra Ugle-Hagan is regarded as the No.1 pick in the national draft but it remains to be seen whether Adelaide pick him as he is tied to the Western Bulldogs as a next generation academy graduate.… [+3673 chars]
